alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florida A and M, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Cody, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Indian Head Acres, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Vereen, Jack McLean Park, Southwood, North Florida Fairgrounds, Cascades Park, Tom Brown Park, Gene Cox Stadium, Governors Square Mall, Natural Bridge, Springsax Park and Walker Ford Community Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
